thread.title: Event Operations Supervisor - Sports Management

title: Event Operations Supervisor - Sports Management
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Event Operations Supervisor Posted/Updated: 10-13-2015 Brief Job Description: Create an unsurpassed event experience with regard to all aspects of our Village area, focused on ensuring seamless operational delivery, maximizing customer satisfaction, and significantly enhancing on site revenue (AER), all in a cost effective fashion   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
